title: Remodeled 3+2 Penthouse Condo in a Gated Community
posting_body: STUNNING 3+2 PENTHOUSE CONDO JUST UNDER 1100 SQFT; REMODELLED AND MOVE IN READY.
PRIVATE/QUIET LOCATION IN THE BACK OF A SECURED COMPLEX WITH 2 CAR COVERED TANDEM PARKING.
LARGE BALCONY W/STORAGE ROOM W/GARDEN VIEWS; UPPER LEVEL CORNER UNIT W/HIGH CEILINGS AND NO ONE ABOVE;LIGHT AND BRIGHT W/SKYLIGHTS AND LARGE WINDOWS IN THE LIVING ROOM.
CENTRAL A/C AND HEATING W/SMART NEST THERMOSTAT.
UPGRADED KITCHEN CABINETS+GRANITE
COUNTER TOPS/BAR TOP/BUILT IN MICROWAVE/RECESS LIGHTS,SIDE BY SIDE 25 CF FRIDGE W/ICE MAKER+WATER.
REMODELLED BATHS W/MARBLE SLAB COUNTERS/MAPLE WOOD VANITIES & CUSTOM TILE WALL ENCLOSURES W/BUILT IN SHELVES AND SHOWER DOORS.
GORGEOUS CUSTOM TILE FLOORS THROUGHOUT.
NEW CEILING FANS IN ALL BEDROOM.
NEWER CIRCUIT BREAKER, CABLE READY; MASTER BEDROOM
CLOSETS + PRIVATE BATH.
VERY CLOSE
THE LAUNDRY ROOM, POOL AND SPA.
EASY ACCESS TO THE 101 FREEWAY, VENTURA BLVD, PLACES OF WORKSHIP, RESTAURANTS AND MORE.
RENT INCLUDES WATER & TRASH.
UNFURNISHED.
Please contact Al for a private showing
Keller Williams Realty
